303.name: Charmander
303.description: +1 Multi per hand played without discards

304.name: Charmeleon
304.description: +2 Multi per hand played without discards

312.name: Ekans
312.description: +8 Multi if played hand contains a Straight

313.name: Arbok
313.description: +15 Multi if played hand contains a Straight. $500 if it also contains Ace

315.name: Clefairy
315.description: Played cards with Club suit give +2 Multi when scored

316.name: Jigglypuff
316.description: Played cards with Spade suit give +2 Multi when scored

317.name: Wigglytuff
317.description: Played cards with Spade suit give +2 Multi and +30 Points when scored

318.name: Paras
318.description: +1 Multi per played hand that contains a Two Pair

319.name: Parasect
319.description: +3 Multi per hand with Two Pairs, -2 Multi without

320.name: Diglett
320.description: +60 Points with Three of a kind, +4 Multi with 2,3,4

321.name: Dugtrio
321.description: +120 Points with Three of a kind, +4 Multi with 2,3,4

322.name: Meowth
322.description: Earn $2000 for each two heart played

323.name: Psyduck
323.description: Earn $500 if played hand is a single face card

324.name: Mankey
324.description: Each played 2,3,5 gives +3 Multi and +5 Points

325.name: Primeape
325.description: Each played 2,3,5 gives +7 Multi and +11 Points

326.name: Growlithe
326.description: +8 Multi if played hand contains a Flush

330.name: Bellsprout
330.description: Even rank cards give +16 Points when scored

331.name: Weepinbell
331.description: Even rank cards give +32 Points when scored

332.name: Tentacool
332.description: Each played 10 gives +8 Multi if hand only has 10s

333.name: Tentacruel
333.description: Each played 10 gives +10 Multi when scored
